MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Irwin Road, Marina Avenue and surrounding streets.  This is causing flickering and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.34PM. Our emergency response team is on site carrying out investigations on our underground cable network and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.57PM on 27th January 2021.
